rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ACX4000}
(Must be enrolled in course type {04} and Must be enrolled in course version {0503, B6002})

description: Students conduct and report on a research project that addresses an important issue in business. The research is likely to have practical as well as theoretical outcomes and implications. The research project is completed under the supervision of academic staff from the Department of Accounting.
